description:
The gasoline leaf blower is an indispensable tool for anyone looking to maintain order in their garden. Powered by a 25.4 cc gasoline engine with a nominal power of 1 HP, it offers excellent performance and reliability. This device is capable of generating an airspeed of 225 km/h, making it effective and quick at removing leaves and more. The blower features a 700 ml fuel tank, ensuring long-lasting operation without frequent refueling. Additionally, the device offers a maximum rotational speed of 7500 rpm.


Applications:



  • Removing leaves from various surfaces

  • Clearing cut grass remnants

  • Blowing loose snow off cars, sidewalks, and driveways

  • Removing trimmed hedge debris


This indispensable device is perfect for anyone who wants to keep not only their garden but also other surfaces clean. Ideal for removing grass remnants or hedge clippings from paving stones, it provides efficiency and convenience in various applications. In winter, it can also be used to remove loose snow from cars, sidewalks, and driveways.


Product Features:


25.4 cc, 1 HP Gasoline Engine



  • Performance and Reliability: The engine provides sufficient power for effective work in various garden conditions.

  • High Efficiency: Perfect for quickly and effectively removing leaves, grass, and other debris.


Airspeed: 225 km/h



  • Effectiveness: High airspeed allows for fast and efficient cleaning of large areas from leaves and other debris.

  • Versatility: Can be used on various surfaces such as lawns, sidewalks, and paving stones.


700 ml Fuel Tank



  • Long-Lasting Operation: The large tank capacity allows for long work sessions without frequent refueling.

  • User Convenience: Fewer interruptions during work increase operational efficiency.


Maximum Rotational Speed: 7500 rpm



  • Efficiency: High rotational speed ensures quick and effective debris removal.


Versatile Applications



  • Garden and Other Surfaces: Effective not only in the garden but also on other surfaces like paving stones.

  • Removing Grass and Hedge Clippings: Excellent for cleaning up after garden work.

  • Winter Applications: Can be used to remove loose snow from cars, sidewalks, and driveways, enhancing its year-round utility.


Technical Specifications:


Engine: Two-stroke E134FB


Displacement: 25.4 cc


Nominal Power: 1 HP


Fuel Mixture: 1:25


Maximum Rotational Speed: 7500 rpm


Fuel Tank Capacity: 700 ml


Airspeed: 60 m/s (225 km/h)


Additional Information: The set includes a fuel mixture preparation tank, spark plug wrench, and a double-sided screwdriver.


Brief product presentation:


https://www.youtube.com/shorts/MuWc6pn3tyw

description.name: Table Saw
description.long_desc:
Our table saw is a reliable tool that will satisfy both DIY enthusiasts and professionals working with wood. Equipped with a 2000W electric motor, this saw provides exceptional performance and cutting precision. Perfect for cutting wood and wood-like materials, it is ideal for both workshop and construction site use.


Our table saw offers not only performance but also comfort and safety at work. It is an excellent choice for anyone who values high-quality workmanship and reliability. See for yourself how easy and enjoyable cutting wood can be with our saw.


Key product features:




  • Powerful 2000W motor – provides the performance you need to cut even the toughest wood.




  • Versatile cutting – allows cuts up to a maximum height of 80 mm at 90° and 65 mm at 45°, making it suitable for various tasks.




  • Adjustable blade height and tilt – a convenient knob allows quick adjustment of the saw to meet cutting requirements.




  • Sawdust extraction system – simply connect an industrial vacuum to keep your workspace clean and tidy.




  • Guide rail set – a rail with a scale for longitudinal cuts and an angled guide with a protractor for precise cuts.




  • Additional screw-on side tables – increase the working area, allowing work with larger pieces.




  • Practical accessory storage – a designated area on the right side of the device for storing the push stick and blade wrench.




  • Included cutting blade – a 255 mm diameter blade with 24 tungsten carbide teeth, ready for immediate use.




Technical specifications:









































Power supply230V / 50Hz
Power2000 W
Rotational speed4200 RPM
Max. cutting height at 90°80 mm
Max. cutting height at 45°65 mm
Blade tilt adjustment0°-45°
Cutting bladetungsten carbide 255 x 30 mm, 24 teeth
Blade guardyes
Dust extraction functionyes

Check out the product presentation on our official channel:

description.name: Wood-burning fire pit 58cm
description.long_desc:
If you are looking for a functional and aesthetically pleasing garden fire pit, the GEKO fire pit is an excellent choice. Here's why:



  • Durable construction: The fire pit is made of powder-coated steel, providing higher resistance to weather conditions.

  • Practical design: With a diameter of 58 cm, the fire pit is large enough to hold wood or coal, yet it does not take up too much space in the garden.

  • Stability: Three screw-on legs provide stability and safety during use.

  • Aesthetic appearance: The black finish gives it a modern and elegant look that fits various garden styles.

  • Ease of transport: Two side handles make it easy to move the fire pit to different locations.

description.name: Solar garden lamp 6x6x40cm
description.long_desc:
Discover a new dimension of garden lighting with our set of 4 solar garden lamps! Made from durable polypropylene, these lamps will not only add charm to your garden but also provide practical outdoor lighting.


Thanks to solar power, you don’t need to worry about connecting them to electricity. Simply place the lamps where they can catch sunlight, and they’ll be ready to shine after dark. Each lamp is powered by 1.2V, 150mAh rechargeable batteries, ensuring long-lasting illumination.


With an IP44 weatherproof rating, our lamps are resistant to outdoor conditions, so you can enjoy them without worrying about moisture or dust. Their compact dimensions (40 x 6 x 6 cm) make them easy to install—just stake them into the ground and enjoy magical garden lighting.


Create unforgettable evenings outdoors with our solar garden lamps—an ideal solution for anyone looking to create a unique atmosphere in their garden!


Technical specifications:



  • Material: Polypropylene

  • Battery: NI-MH 1.2V 150mAh

  • Power: 0.06W

  • Dimensions: 40 x 6 x 6 cm

  • Quantity in the set: 4 pieces

description.name: Solar garden lamp 4,5x4,5x30cm
description.long_desc:
Add a unique charm to your garden with the set of 10 Keltin solar garden lights. These compact spike lights (4.5 x 4.5 x 30 cm) are not only a practical light source but also a stylish decorative element that enhances the atmosphere around your home.



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Light color: 4000K neutral white

  • Lighting time: approximately 6 hours

  • Light source: Integrated high-power DIP LED diodes

  • Dusk sensor: Lights automatically turn on at dusk

  • Energy efficiency: Utilizing solar energy ensures cost savings

  • Protection rating: IP44, high resistance to weather conditions

  • Dimensions: 4.5 x 4.5 x 30 cm

  • Quantity in package: 10 pcs


Advantages and Applications:



  • Decoration and functionality: Keltin solar lights perfectly highlight the garden atmosphere, creating a unique ambiance.

  • Safe lighting: The built-in dusk sensor automatically activates the lights at dusk, allowing safe movement along beautifully lit paths.

  • Easy installation: Avoid costly electrical wiring installation—simply insert the spike of the solar light into a spot where sunlight reaches, and enjoy excellent lighting. The entire installation process is extremely simple and quick.

  • Amorphous solar panel: Charges even on cloudy days, providing a constant light source regardless of the weather.

description.name: Yellow and black warning tape 100m x 70mm
description.long_desc:
Warning tape in yellow and black color



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Color: Yellow and black

  • Thickness: 30 microns

  • Width: 7 cm

  • Length: 100 m

  • Quantity: 4 pcs per package


Applications:




  • Marking hazardous areas: The warning tape is used to mark areas where there may be hazards, such as construction zones, places with protruding elements, or areas with damage.




  • Indicating construction site hazards: Used to define boundaries and work zones on construction sites to alert workers and bystanders of potential dangers.




  • Identifying renovation areas: Helps identify areas undergoing renovation or repair where additional hazards, such as loose materials or dangerous machinery, may be present.

category.name: Load Securing
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Load Securing

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Load Securing

description.name: Webbing belt sling 5T 4M 150mm
description.long_desc:
We present our web slings, which are indispensable for transporting and lifting heavy objects. The slings are designed to be safe, durable, and easy to use and provide you with an effective solution when lifting and carrying a wide variety of loads.


Main features of web slings:



  • Durable materials: Our slings are made of high-quality, tensile, and damage-resistant materials such as polyester or nylon. These materials are characterized by high tensile strength, which allows for the safe lifting of even heavy objects.

  • Certificates and standards: Our slings have the appropriate certificates and EN standards, which confirm compliance with the highest safety and quality standards. You can rest assured that our slings are tested and proven for strength and reliability.

  • Wide application: Webbing slings are used in various fields and industries. They can be used in warehouses, construction sites, transport, industry, or in-home garages. They are ideal for lifting and moving heavy objects such as pallets, steel structures, machinery, or furniture.


An example of the use of belt slings::



  • Pallet handling: Belt slings are perfect for moving pallets with goods in warehouses, production halls, or shops. Thanks to them, you can safely lift and transport heavy pallet loads.

  • Assembly of steel constructions: Webbing slings are irreplaceable during the assembly and lifting of steel constructions. They allow for precise and controlled lifting of large elements, ensuring safe and effective work.

  • Moving machinery and equipment: Webbing slings are used when moving and positioning heavy machinery and equipment at their destination. They are also used in car workshops, e.g. when removing engines.


Technical data:


Material: Poliester (PES)


Load: 5 T


Length: 4 m


Width: 150 mm


safety factor: 7:1


Manufactured to: EN 1492-1

description.name: Webbing belt sling 5T 6M 150mm
description.long_desc:
We present our web slings, which are indispensable for transporting and lifting heavy objects. The slings are designed to be safe, durable, and easy to use and provide you with an effective solution when lifting and carrying a wide variety of loads.


Main features of web slings:



  • Durable materials: Our slings are made of high-quality, tensile, and damage-resistant materials such as polyester or nylon. These materials are characterized by high tensile strength, which allows for the safe lifting of even heavy objects.

  • Certificates and standards: Our slings have the appropriate certificates and EN standards, which confirm compliance with the highest safety and quality standards. You can rest assured that our slings are tested and proven for strength and reliability.

  • Wide application: Webbing slings are used in various fields and industries. They can be used in warehouses, construction sites, transport, industry, or in-home garages. They are ideal for lifting and moving heavy objects such as pallets, steel structures, machinery, or furniture.


An example of the use of belt slings::



  • Pallet handling: Belt slings are perfect for moving pallets with goods in warehouses, production halls, or shops. Thanks to them, you can safely lift and transport heavy pallet loads.

  • Assembly of steel constructions: Webbing slings are irreplaceable during the assembly and lifting of steel constructions. They allow for precise and controlled lifting of large elements, ensuring safe and effective work.

  • Moving machinery and equipment: Webbing slings are used when moving and positioning heavy machinery and equipment at their destination. They are also used in car workshops, e.g. when removing engines.


Technical data:


Material: Poliester (PES)


Load: 5 T


Length: 6 m


Width: 150 mm


safety factor: 7:1


Manufactured to: EN 1492-1
